name: EnterVR
description: "EnterVR" is VR game that including crossbow shooting and tower defense in one game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA: GTX 1060 / GTX 970 / GTX TITAN or greater. | AMD: RX 480 / R9 390 / R9 290 or greater Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 6400 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA: GTX 1060 / GTX 970 / GTX TITAN or greater. | AMD: RX 480 / R9 390 / R9 290 or greater Storage: 1024 MB available space
